name: pooh
body:
[2015 update]

With Yosemite OSX I had problems making the .dmg with Disk Utility.

So even easier (but requires a new *blank* disk!) success path:
* open “Disk Utility” app
* *carefully* figure out which your source and dest disks are
* click on the dest/blank disk
* click “Restore” tab to the right
* drag source disk (from left) to the “Source” type-in.
* drag dest/blank disk (from left) to the “Destination” type-in.
* click “Restore” in lower right
* go watch a movie!
